column4: i used sudo apt-get --purge remove nvidia* to remove prev drivers (I followed instruction on ubuntu help pages)
I've also remove and blacklisted nouveaut
but not sure about the sequence: at a given moment xorg wasn starting anymore
so I reinstalled xorg and then nvidia-current again
I 'm currently running the drivers from nvidia (256-53)
it was working fine 3 or 4 month ago, with compiz etc
what version of ubuntu are you running?
you probably need to run the apt-get to have the current nvidia driver redownloaded and installed
one sec ill get the line for you

are you using hardware drivers GUI to get it or synaptic or apt-get?

probably I missed your question. I installed nvidia 195 using apt-get,  since that didn worked, I then removed them, quite likely didn reboot and installe nvidia 256 driver from it's own semi-graphic tool
